about_the_game:
Feel the life energy within West Town

"NOOK FALL: West Town" is an isometric visual novel game. Set in a fictional small town called "West Town," the game revolves around a festival celebration about to take place. As an outsider arriving in West Town, you will, over the course of more than ten days, interact and explore, gradually uncovering the current state of the town and a story from thirty years ago.

You are free to explore this charming and imaginative little town at your own pace. Ride the tram through its various districts, wandering the streets and alleys. Different times and places will bring fresh experiences.

Witness the transition between old and new in West Town

Run a quiet little shop nestled in a corner of the city, observing the ebb and flow of people. Sometimes there are sound and fury, quiet and peaceful in other days. Warmth and cold share their place in the city. Many stories naturally unfold and come to an end. If you happen to be inside this little shop, you may find moments that touch you and memories to cherish.

Embrace the city's sunset, then return to your own cozy corner, play some music, read the news, and relax.

Your time in West Town may be short, but what seems like an ordinary life may leave a unique mark on your memories.

About Developer

We are NarraTruth Games, an independent game studio based in Guangzhou. Our team first met at game exhibitions and creative events. We are fond of the small-town atmosphere and retro visual style, which inspired us to create the world of West Town. We hope to bring more exciting games to everyone in the future!

About Publisher

GCORES PUBLISHING is an indie game publishing business established by GCORES. In the future, we will continue to bring you outstanding indie games from the BOOOM Game jam. Welcome to our publisher site for more information.

About BOOOM

The BOOOM Game jam is a game development event held twice a year, where participants are given three weeks to develop a game based on a specific theme. After the development phase, we host an online game festival where all players can try out the games, and these games are also showcased at the G-FUSION offline video game carnival.
